last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 82
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Seyran and Ferit's life under the same roof begins to disturb everyone, Seyran, who openly challenges Ferit, has a hard time facing the consequences of her decision. Diyar, who does not hesitate to fight for Ferit, finally decides to confront Seyran. While Ifakat is getting ready to enjoy her plan that is working smoothly, an unexpected move from Betül surprises everyone. This time, Abidin is determined to hurt everyone and to remove those who tore him away from where he belongs. As Abidin's anger brings Suna and Seyran face to face, one of the two siblings will have to make a sacrifice. While Ferit is having great difficulty trying to resist Seyran, remembering his turbulent and passionate past with Seyran makes him once again sure of his calm and comfortable relationship with Diyar. Seyran must now overcome even greater obstacles for her feelings for Ferit and fight for her love.

name: Golden Boy
overview: A young girl is forced to marry a rich groom. The groom is not only rich, but also allows himself to live without any restrictions or obligations. Will married life change his habits? And how will such a man be accepted by a good-hearted wife?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A decision is made that, Ferit, who angered his family - especially his grandfather - Halis Aga, with his irresponsibility, must marry a suitable girl from Gaziantep. Although Ferit doesn't want to get married, he can't step on his grandfather's word. Finding the right bride is the duty of Halis Aga's eldest bride, Ifakat. The surprise to be experienced at the requested ceremony of Suna, who is suitable to be the bride of the Korhan Family in Gaziantep, will affect both Suna and her sister Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Korhan Family wants Seyran instead of Suna. As soon as Kazim says yes to this offer, preparations begin. Although Seyran objects to this decision, she cannot convince both her aunt Hattuç and her father Kazim. Seyran asks Yusuf to kidnap her to avoid marrying Ferit. Ferit, on the other hand, does not worry about this marriage because he thinks that nothing will change in his life. Action-packed days are about to begin for both Ferit and Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Seyran, who came to Istanbul after the wedding, is trying both to get used to the order of the Korhans and to adapt to her new family. Halis Aga, on the other hand, has a new plan in mind for Ferit. Rumors about Suna in Antep annoy Kazim and push him to make a decision.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ferit's efforts to get used to his new workplace and his quarrels with Seyran continue. Kazim, who comes to Istanbul, first comes to visit Halis Aga. Seyran, who learns the habits of the Korhan family as time passes, unwittingly witnesses what happened between Ifakat and Orhan. Asuman's surgery brings together Fuat and the Korhans to support Asuman. Seyran encounters a surprise when she least expects it.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ferit, who learns that Yusuf is Seyran's ex-boyfriend, is upset by this situation. Yusuf insists on talking to Seyran. When Seyran says she needs to talk to Suna to explain the situation, Ferit keeps the sisters alone. At the invitation of Gülgün, Kazim and the whole family come to visit the Korhans.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ferit, who has a fight with Yusuf, does not calm down for a long time and takes his anger out on Seyran. Bad news awaits Seyran, who scores very well in the university exam. Surprises are experienced one after another at a family dinner with Kazim and Suna. Pelin has no intention of giving up on Ferit and Yusuf has no intention of giving up on Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yusuf finds a job at the mansion, saying that he is a distant relative of Seyran. Ferit, on the other hand, gets very angry at this situation and offers to spend the whole day with Seyran to talk about what is going on. Fuat continues to work with Suna. Halis Aga's visit to Kazim causes the opening of old notebooks with Hattuç. Suna and Seyran's dinner with Fuat and Ferit ends in an unexpected surprise.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: When Ferit tells Seyran that Suna kissed him at night, Seyran gets very angry and although Ferit says he is innocent, she does not believe him and accuses him. When Seyran learns that her mother is sick, she takes her breath with her and stays with her mother for the night. Ferit, on the other hand, takes advantage of the situation and goes out with Pelin. While Seyran is asking Suna to account for her kissing Ferit, Kazim gets mad and puts his new plan into motion for Suna.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Seyran asks Ferit for help to save Suna. Ferit plans to kidnap Suna. They carry out their plan without Kazim's knowledge. When Kazim realizes that Suna has disappeared, he takes his anger out on Esme. How Suna will enter the mansion is another tricky issue.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Suna feels responsible for what happened with Kazim and leaves a note and returns home from the mansion. Ferit explains everything to Halis Aga, who is informed that Suna has secretly left the mansion in the morning. Thereupon, Halis Aga visits Kazim with a new plan in mind. When Ferit brings Halis Aga's request for grandchildren to the agenda again, Seyran and Ferit continue their unfinished match. Seyran's past with Yusuf continues to make Ferit restless. He invites Yusuf to their room and asks him an unexpected question.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Seyran is extremely upset by Yusuf's answer to Ferit's question and doesn't want to see either of them. An unpleasant surprise awaits Ferit, who goes out with Abidin at night. Unwittingly photographed by a journalist, Ferit asks Orhan for help to get rid of this trouble without Halis Aga's knowledge. The person who can help Ferit in this matter is Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: They convince Kazim and Halis Aga that the photograph in the newspaper is an old one. Ferit is very angry with Taylan, who publishes the photos, and he has no intention of letting this go easily. Ifakat, on the other hand, takes care of Suna and begins to train her, as they promised Kazim.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Ferit leaves the house as a result of Halis Aga's slap on him. Kazim, who arrived at the mansion after Yusuf told him what had happened, took Seyran and Suna back. When Ferit, who had taken refuge in Pelin, informs her that he has decided to leave, Pelin informs Seyran to stop him.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Seyran's kissing Ferit is not enough to turn Ferit from his path. On the other hand, Halis Aga fell ill and was taken to the hospital. Halis Aga, who survived the critical situation and went home, will also have a request from Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Ferit cannot digest Seyran's departure and goes to Kazim's to get his wife. After what Halis Aga said, Kazim is determined to take Seyran and return to Antep with his entire family, but Ferit will not allow Seyran to go. Ferit, who takes Seyran with him, has a New Year's plan in mind that will unite the whole family.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: After the New Year's meeting, everything goes back to the old times at the mansion, and it's time for a magazine shoot where Ferit and Seyran will be on the cover. The editor of the magazine is Defne, who knew Orhan a long time ago. A night full of unexpected events awaits Ferit.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Efe Han, who is looking for a new face for his own collection, wants to talk to Seyran. Defne, who is an intermediary in this work, gets on the nerves of Ferit, Orhan, and Ifakat. Seyran is confused and goes to Kazim for consultation. Ferit makes a move to get Serter out of Pelin's life, but this move will have surprising consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Ferit, who learns that Seyran went to meet Efe Han alone and signed a contract, goes crazy and takes his breath with Defne and Efe. Serter's uncle, on the other hand, has no intention of letting Ferit go unless Ferit leaves Pelin alone. Ifakat is afraid that Halis Aga will hear what happened between her and Orhan.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Ferit, who is very angry that Seyran and Suna are having dinner with Efe and Defne, makes a scene at the restaurant. The tension between Ferit and Seyran continues after Ferit goes to Pelin, who needs help after Serter's unexpected departure. Ferit, who brings Pelin to the mansion by making an unexpected move, makes Seyran very angry.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: When they learn that Kazim was shot and Ferit is with him, all family members end up in the hospital. What happens to Kazim affects everyone deeply. While the waters between Seyran and Ferit calm down a bit, Pelin's situation makes Seyran take an unexpected decision.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Halis Aga, who is both angry and affected by what he hears after speaking with Seyran, establishes new rules at the mansion and at the workplace. Halis Aga's words, who include Ferit in the work, are very heavy. Seyran makes an unexpected move. The feelings between Suna and Abidin intensify.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Ferit's confession has made Seyran very happy, but Seyran still has no intention of giving up control and is quick to take Ferit to a close mark. While Halis Aga storms the mansion, Fuat gets his share of this situation. Trying to get used to the new job and his new order, Ferit also looks for ways to get closer to Seyran. Latif's handling of affairs in the mansion is difficult for the Sultan, Sefika and others. Ifakat, on the other hand, has a new plan for this situation.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: When Halis Aga learns that Fuat and Asuman are on bad terms, calls Seyran and asks her for support on this issue. Ferit, who learns about the situation, quickly makes a plan. On the other hand, Defne comes to talk to Ifakat and Gülgün about Seyran's withdrawal from the project. Kazim, on the other hand, is determined to carry out his plans for the land. Suna and Abidin, Ferit and Seyran, and Asuman and Fuat, who came together with Ferit's plan, will also take important decisions during their short vacation.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Asuman and Fuat raise the issue of adoption to Orhan, Gülgün, and Ifakat, but they get an unexpected answer. Seyran has made a decision to reconcile with Ferit, but a new test awaits the two of them. Ferit and Gülgün are both surprised and nervous about Zerrin's demands. Ferit, who asks Pelin about Zerrin, gets an unexpected reaction from Pelin. An unexpected person rushes to the help of Orhan, who is overwhelmed by the pressure at home and at work. Kazim Aga, on the other hand, begins to get used to his new order in the Korhans company.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: After what Seyran heard, she gets very angry, and cold winds begin to blow between her and Ferit. While finding a suitor (Saffet) for Suna, Ifakat convinces Suna to go out to dinner with Saffet together with Seyran and Ferit. Both Abidin and Suna do not like this situation. On the other hand, Ifakat continues to cooperate with the Sultan to realize her plans for Latif. Zerrin's target this time is Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Seyran returns home after seeing Ferit in Pelin's house, but she stands tall. Zerrin does not miss any opportunity to create the tension she wants. Kazims are guests of Korhans at iftar. When the situation between Suna and Saffet is discussed at the table, Ferit gets approval from Kazim to have another meeting with Saffet on the boat. While the progress of things is devastating both Suna and Abidin, Abidin makes an offer to Suna. When Zerrin's new move makes Seyran uneasy, she takes precautions in a way no one expected.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: For Seyran, who catches Ferit's hand in the air, the ropes come to the breaking point and she takes her breath in Kazim's house. When Halis Aga learns that Seyran has left the house, he gets very angry. Ifakat is pleased with this development. When Ferit learns about the situation with Suna, his reaction is to hold Abidin to account, and a quarrel ensues between the two. While Ifakat's plan is working smoothly, Seyran's insistence on not returning to the mansion continues. Saffet tells his grandfather that he wants to marry Suna. Pelin takes one more step to win Ferit...

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Kazim's fight with Ferit makes things harder for Seyran and Ferit. Abidin tells Suna that he quit his job and what happened with Ferit, and proposes to her. After Ferit, Seyran also learns about Suna and Abidin. Saffet Aga takes Saffet and his brother Tarik and goes to meet Kazim's. While Suna is helpless in the face of all these, a surprise awaits Seyran. While Halis Aga's anger towards Kazim breaks his relationship with Hattuç, Ifakat continues to implement her plan meticulously. More than one danger awaits Ferit.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: When Ferit learns from Suna that Kazim will marry Seyran, he goes crazy and raids Saffet Aga's house. When Abidin finds out about the situation, he goes after Ferit to protect him. Ferit makes peace with Abidin and brings him back to the mansion. Hearing that Ferit has gone to Saffet Agas, Halis Aga finds out what happened and ends up in Kazim's house. On the other hand, Zerrin continues to meet Kazim and implement her plan. Her new move is to take with her someone whose reckoning with the Korhans has not been completed in the past. Saffet is very happy to marry Suna ...

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Seyran and Ferit sign the divorce papers and Halis Aga kicks Seyran out. Saffet Aga, Kazim, and Tarik take Seyran from the mansion. Seeing Tarik and realizing that he has taken advantage of the situation, Ferit gets mad and fights with Tarik. After Seyran leaves, Ferit cannot contain his anger and argues with both Halis Aga and Orhan. Ifakat, who sees Ferit throwing himself outside to clear his head, does not delay in informing Zerrin. Zerrin convinces Pelin to go after Ferit. When Kazim hears that Seyran has signed a letter of consent, he takes it out on her again. ...

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Neither Abidin nor Gülgün can dissuade Ferit who proposes to Pelin. Following this decision, Ferit throws himself out again. After Seyran learns that Ferit will marry Pelin, a storm breaks out inside her. Tarik pays attention to Seyran. When Kazim is confused by something Seyran blurts out, he asks Hattuç to take a hand in the matter. Seyran cannot contain herself and confronts Ferit about Pelin before the court. Suna goes to look for a wedding dress. Saffet Aga gives Kazim a generous gift. The court date for Ferit and Seyran's divorce case arrives.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Seyran's fainting after the court worries everyone, especially Ferit. Both Ferit and Seyran are very upset about what happened. Ferit cannot rest without seeing Seyran and finds a way to get out of the mansion and see Seyran. Zerrin and Pelin are invited to the mansion to talk about Ferit and Pelin's situation. Suna and Saffet's wedding preparations are in full swing. Tarik is looking forward to the day he will marry Seyran. Ferit can't handle what happened and takes his anger out on the entire household. On the other hand, Ferit wants to help Abidin with Suna and ...

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Having kidnapped Seyran and Suna from the wedding, Ferit, and Abidin try to find the safest place to go. Seyran and Suna are determined not to turn back from their path even though they are scared. Saffet Aga and Kazim Aga come to the mansion to hold the Korhans to account. Esme makes an unexpected exit to Kazim. Everyone at the mansion joins hands to find Ferit, Seyran, and Suna. Fuat, together with Asuman, takes action to support Ferit. Tarik is on Fuat's neck like everyone else. The news that arrives at the mansion will change everything.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Fuat's death deeply affects everyone, especially Ferit. Everyone, including Saffet Aga and his family, is together for condolences. Ferit is devastated by Fuat's death and when he sees Tarik at the funeral, he breaks the ropes. Seyran is determined not to leave Ferit. Gülgün cannot overcome her anger towards Orhan. Zerrin and Pelin continue to stir up trouble. When Ferit visits Fuat's grave, he receives an unexpected message. After a long time, Halis Aga brings down the walls he has built on Hattuç. While Kazim puts his marriage plan for Suna into practice, his ...

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Kazim, who separated Seyran from Ferit, takes his breath in Saffet Aga's together with Seyran. Pelin, on the other hand, makes a move that worries Zerrin very much after what she sees. Ferit confronts Tarik and puts a rest on him. Tarik, on the other hand, responds to this rest by intimidating Orhan. Later, when he learns that Seyran spent the night with Ferit, he offers Seyran to take her back to the Kazims. Ferit feels very lonely after all that has happened and offers to Seyran to run away together again. Seyran makes an important decision after the visit of ...

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: After Ferit receives Seyran's letter, he starts looking for her from all sides. Abidin learns that Suna has married Saffet and is devastated. Seyran is not herself. When she arrives in Antep with Hattuç, they see that the mansion is surrounded by Tarik and the guards. As soon as Ferit learns that Seyran is in Antep, he rushes to Antep and meets Seyran at Vakkas Usta's shop. Afterward, he offers Seyran to run away together again. Tarik does not leave Seyran's pursuit for a moment. Things are not going well at the mansion, and there is another surprise.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: After Ferit is shot, he is brought to Istanbul urgently. While Seyran does not leave Ferit's side, everyone, especially Gülgün, is very angry with Seyran. The surgery Ferit will undergo is risky. Suna, on the other hand, escaped from Saffet Ağa's house during a fight and is with Seyran and supporting her. Hatice meets with Saffet and Halis Ağa to prevent further chaos and closes the issue of Saffet Ağa. While Ferit and Seyran's love knows no obstacles, Kazım also gains an advantage and takes advantage of this position. İfakat; she is forced to support Seyran and Ferit's relationship. While Seyran and Ferit are happy to meet each other, they get married again. After all that happened, Halis Ağa invites his daughter Nükhet and his grandson Kaya to Istanbul.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: The arrival of Nükhet and Kaya increases both competition and discussions in the mansion. While Nükhet makes an unexpected statement to Halis; Ferit searches for a way to get rid of Nükhet and Kaya in Kazım. Seyran tries to calm things down. Nükhet seems to have easily taken control of the mansion. After all that happened, Orhan; embarks on a whole new quest. İfakat puts her plan for Seyran into action. While Kazım's arrival to dinner in the evening further escalates the tension, the waters between Ferit and Kaya do not calm down. The tension between the two causes an unexpected development.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: After what happened at the mansion, Ferit goes to Kazım's with Seyran and decides to stay there. Ferit, who enjoys being with Kazım, has also found a way to make Seyran do what he wants. Seyran, on the other hand, is worried that Ferit will obey Kazım. After what happened, Nükhet talks to Kaya and takes him to Kazım's house. Ferit's first session with Talih takes an unexpected turn. Ferit goes to the mansion to talk to Halis, thinking about the life he will build from now on. In the face of Halis' clear attitude, Ferit makes another move that surprises the whole mansion.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Halis Ağa, who takes action to open a new store in Marmaris, assigns Ferit and Kaya for this job, at Nükhet's request. With the inclusion of Seyran, Suna, Asuman and Abidin in the plan, the team heads to Marmaris. In the mansion, Nükhet tries to manage Kazım Ağa, but Kazım's demands are increasing. While Orhan has let everything go, the only good thing for him is the time he spends with Dicle. Ferit is disturbed by the actions of Seyran, who is having fun in Marmaris; he tries to restrain her. Suna vents to Abidin. Kaya's surprise leads Seyran and Ferit into a disagreement.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Kaya's help to Seyran with the university makes Ferit very angry, and his argument with Seyran does not end when he returns to the mansion. While Kazım Ağa supports the children's decision; those at home also support Seyran's reading. Gülgün also makes new decisions about herself. Sultan locks Dicle in her room. Ferit is in trouble again with his arm and finds himself with Talih. Seyran announces her decision to go to college over dinner. Kaya, on the other hand, has new plans in his mind.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Although Ferit is disappointed when he sees Seyran coming to school with Kaya, he does not let Kazım and the others crush her in the mansion. Seyran, on the other hand, manages to win Ferit's heart. Orhan makes a new move to prevent what the Sultan did to Dicle. İfakat, on the other hand, surprises and confuses Suna during a conversation. Seyran goes crazy when she catches Sultan putting pills into the coffee.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Pelin's baby surprise stuns Ferit. Kazım, on the other hand, is furious after what he hears and asks him to be brought to the mansion to settle accounts with Sultan. Ferit asks İfakat to bring Sultan to the mansion. Unable to cope with all this, Ferit takes Abidin and throws himself out. While unexpected developments take place at night, Seyran's greatest support comes from Gülgün. Halis Ağa, who learns about Sultan's actions, asks İfakat to account for this. Kazım, who has a one-on-one reckoning with Sultan, decides to close the subject after what he hears. Meanwhile, Kaya and Suna spend a day together. While Ferit is trying to digest the news that he will become a father, Pelin has new plans in her mind.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: Seyran, who confronts Ferit over what Sultan tells her, is stunned. Ferit, on the other hand, tells Seyran all the facts. Kazım, who catches Suna and Kaya kissing, becomes furious and takes out his anger on both of them. Seyran and Ferit, who learn about the events when they return home, can't understand how things are moving so quickly between Suna and Kaya. Kaya, on the other hand, says that he wants to marry Suna. While Seyran blames İfakat, Ferit gets angry with Suna. Ferit, who wants to tell Abidin the truth himself, takes him out and encounters an unexpected old acquaintance at night. Pelin and Zerrin go to Şehmuz's house and put the first step of their plan into action. On the other hand, as Nükhet furthers her work with Sultan and pushes İfakat more and more into a corner, there is a detail that she does not take into account.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: Nükhet finds a way to evade the accusations against her and leaves the house by making an unexpected move. Ferit and Abidin continue to keep Taylan under surveillance. Kazım, on the other hand, presses everyone, including Halis Ağa, about Suna and Kaya. Halis Ağa decides to make Suna and Kaya promise, upon Kaya's positive attitude. Seyran asks Ferit to account for the photos. Ferit suspects that Pelin is behind this and takes action to find out. While Seyran tries to resolve Suna and Kaya's incident, tension between her and Suna rises. Pelin and Pırıl advance their plans regarding the photographs. Şehmuz, on the other hand, takes full control of Pelin.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: Ferit is cornered by Şehmuz's conditions and finds the solution by asking for help from Ifakat. İfakat convinces Ferit that they should tell everything to Halis Ağa; when Halis Ağa learns about the situation, he takes Ferit and goes to Şehmuz's door. Şehmuz's attitude is clear; if there is no Ferit, he will marry Pelin to someone else. At the mansion, Suna and Kaya's words are interrupted. Nükhet confronts Suna with the facts, but gets an unexpected reaction from Suna. Seyran, on the other hand, takes action to find out the truth behind the photos. Halis Ağa asks Ferit to make a choice.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: Seyran learns that Pırıl is Pelin's cousin, and her suspicion that Pelin is the one who set a trap for them becomes stronger. Ferit, on the other hand, feels very stuck and with no way out. Seyran; after all these events, she begins to welcome the idea of having children. While Kazım is planning Suna and Kaya's wedding at lightning speed, Nükhet can't understand Suna's silence despite knowing everything. Halis Ağa; he calls Seyran to explain all the facts to her. Asuman; she sees Orhan and Dicle together. Ferit makes an offer to Pelin and her baby to save her from Şehmuz's hands. Suna; she sees Pelin, whom Ferit and Abidin are hiding, and realizes that she is pregnant.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: After what happened at the wedding, Seyran leaves the mansion spilling her anger into everyone. Ferit tries to stop her and bring her back, but his efforts are unsuccessful. As the tension between Kazım and Halis Ağa escalates; Nükhet is very happy that Şehmuz is at home and her plan is working. The ties between Orhan and Gülgün come to the point of breaking completely. Halis Ağa kicks Kazım out of the mansion and asks Ferit to take care of his child while Seyran makes up her mind and leaves. Kaya, on the one hand, has no intention of losing Suna and takes action to win her. Suna, on the other hand, makes a radical move. While taking shelter in her school, Seyran is determined to leave both Ferit and all her experiences behind.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Kazım goes back to the past with the effect of the surprise and defeat he experienced after being thrown into the street and enters into a showdown with Hattuç years later. Seyran, on the other hand, opens the door to a new world. While the speech that brings İfakat to her feet comes from someone she did not expect, catching Orhan at Dicle's house is the final point for Gülgün and her decision surprises everyone. Suna, on the other hand, will do her best to ensure that her marriage with Kaya goes smoothly. While a development related to Esme brings Seyran and Suna together, the tension between the two is put into words.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Seyran is hurt even more when Halis brings Pelin home and Ferit's photos with Pelin are published. Ferit, on the other hand, is left without a way out. While Suna doesn't follow İfakat's words; she continues to manipulate Kaya. Angered by Gülgün's decision to leave the house, Orhan makes an unexpected move. Nükhet confronts both Halis and Kaya with her statement. Ece and Nihan's unconditional support for Seyran continues. Ferit decides to work and his drawings are appreciated. On the other hand, Kazim puts his new plan into practice.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Although Ferit goes crazy when he finds out that Kazım has kidnapped Seyran, he tells everyone at home that he is behind the decision to break up, but he still does not delay in secretly going after Seyran. Pelin is afraid that Sacide will tell everything. When Suna gets worried about Seyran, she can't stay at home and takes action with Ferit to find Seyran. Kaya hears what İfakat tells Suna about Abidin. Kazım asks Seyran to go on television and talk about the Korhans. Orhan asks for İfakat's help to eliminate Halis Ağa. Ferit manages to kidnap Seyran from Kazım and the two have a showdown again.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: What Seyran tells on the television program causes great chaos and injures everyone, especially Ferit and Suna. The program wreaks havoc for the Korhans and the arguments in the house grow. Gülgün worries about what will happen to Seyran and takes her in. Şehmuz starts to host Kazim in his house. Suna settles accounts with Seyran after what happened. Ferit is also forced to come to Gülgün's house. Ferit and Seyran have a parting speech.

episodes.name: Episode 53
episodes.overview: Seyran, who falls into the trap set by Ferit, is upset and angry about what happened but realizes better that she must stand behind the decisions she has made for her own life. Halis Aga, on the other hand, is proud of Ferit, who has taken a big step to clear their surname. Having regained his grandfather's support, Ferit starts working to create his own brand and prepares for an extraordinary move to achieve what he dreams of. But things go differently than he had hoped. Seyran, who strives for her own life, faces reactions due to the statements that are on the agenda, but she is happy with the support she receives from people she never expected. Şefika, who struggles to bear the pain of the injustices done to Seyran and the burden of the truths she knows, shares with Gülgün and Seyran very important facts about Halis Ağa that will shock them.

episodes.name: Episode 54
episodes.overview: While Seyran and Gülgün are shocked by the facts they learned about Latif Bey, they try to decide what move to make. Wanting to start somewhere to stand on her own feet, Seyran rolls up her sleeves. But she comes face to face with Gülgün, who sees this struggle insignificant. While Ferit, who wants to make a new start and create his own brand, continues to try to convince Nevra, Pelin, who thinks that she does not receive enough love and attention from Ferit, rebels against this situation. It is not easy for Seyran to witness all these events. Seyran, who confronted Latif Bey, says she wants to make a deal with him. Deciding to make Kazım pay a big price, Orhan prepares a dangerous and cruel plan. While Ferit, who learns the situation, enters into a great struggle to save Kazım, Kazım is on the fine line between death and life.

episodes.name: Episode 55
episodes.overview: Learning that Kazım's life is in danger, Orhan gets in a great panic and asks İfakat for help so that the situation does not come to Halis Ağa's ears. Seyran, who is on the verge of losing her father, is determined to give the punishment they deserve to those who put him through this. Remembering the difficult times when his father supported him in the past, Ferit tries hard to hide the truth from Seyran, while also making great efforts to prevent his father from going to prison. Seyran is grateful to Ferit for saving her father, but she does not give up trying to find Orhan's trace. Ferit, who has completed all the preparations to smuggle his father abroad, is very close to achieving his goal, but Seyran has not made her final move yet.

episodes.name: Episode 56
episodes.overview: While Orhan's capture at the last moment is devastating for father and son, Ferit, who is very sad and angry, rebels against Seyran for doing this. Halis Agha, who learns what happened, speaks more harshly than ever and tells Orhan that he must pay for his irresponsibility. Pelin, who panics with Serter's arrival, feels cornered even though she dodges her mother's insistent questions. Ferit, who is looking for a way to save his father from prison, realizes that the only way is to convince Kazım to withdraw his complaint. Seyran, who is unhappy with the turn of events and feels sorry for the situation Ferit is in, is forced to accept Kazım's conditions in exchange for withdrawing her complaint. While Serter, who thinks that the child is his, goes after Pelin, Ferit, and Seyran are shocked to learn about this development that could change everything.

episodes.name: Episode 57
episodes.overview: Ferit, reluctant to believe the possibility that the child might be Serter's, tries to get Pelin to reveal the truth to dispel his doubts. Seyran, unwilling to see Pelin under such pressure as she prepares to hold her child, tries to support her despite everything that has happened. Seyran, forced to accept her father's terms in exchange for withdrawing her complaint, feels trapped in a dilemma. Orhan, hoping for good news from Kazım to regain his freedom, finds himself in serious trouble in prison. Confused by Fikriye's words, Suna clings to a deep-seated dream in her heart once again. As Serter begins to unravel the matter to Halis Ağa, believing the child might be his, this development initiates a critical process for Pelin and the baby.

episodes.name: Episode 58
episodes.overview: While Pelin, who fell ill, was rushed to the hospital, Ferit is very angry, holding Serter responsible for what happened. While Pelin and her baby are struggling to survive, Halis Ağa, who wants to find out who the child is from, orders a paternity test to be done. Seyran, who comes to the hospital despite all the bad looks to support Ferit, does her best to help Pelin hold on to life. Halis, who decides to release Orhan, who is having a very difficult time in prison, is disappointed when things do not go as he wanted and is forced to ask for help from an old acquaintance. While critical hours last for Pelin and her baby, Ferit tries to stay strong with Seyran by his side in this difficult moment. But what will happen will not be easy for him.

episodes.name: Episode 59
episodes.overview: Ferit, who goes through a difficult process with the events and the facts that emerge, realizes better how great the love he feels for Seyran is. Halis Ağa, who puts aside past disagreements in order to save Orhan from prison, meets with Count Ziya. Influenced by what Fikriye says, Suna makes important moves that can change the course of the relationship between Ferit and Seyran. Seyran, who rebels against her father's pressure, is surprised by the surprise Kazım has prepared for her. While Seyran, who wants Orhan to be released from prison, is willing to silence the voice of his heart in order to solve this issue, Ferit, who dreams of a new beginning with her, is faced with a shocking development.

episodes.name: Episode 60
episodes.overview: Ferit, who learns that Seyran is on the eve of a relationship with Akin, does not want to believe this development. Seyran, who is subjected to pressure from her father, continues to struggle to overcome the troubled period she is in. Orhan, who is going through hard times in prison, feels left alone because he cannot get the support he expects from Halis Aga. Ferit, who wants to help his father, continues to look for solutions. Seyran, threatened by Ökkes, comes face to face with the fact that there is only one way to save Orhan's life and asks for Suna's help to push Ferit away. Ferit, who wants to start a new page with Seyran, experiences a moment that will destroy all his dreams.

episodes.name: Episode 61
episodes.overview: Seyran's choice to go with Akin is a great disappointment for Ferit and he has a nervous breakdown. Even though Seyran made this choice to save Orhan, she suffers for leaving Ferit alone in such a situation. Ferit, who had to give up the idea of establishing his own brand due to pressure from his grandfather, receives an unexpected offer from Nevra. While Ferit is looking for a way to save his father, who is having a hard time in prison, Ökkes has a great request from Orhan for his release. Believing that Seyran still loves him despite what happened, Ferit confronts Kazim and Seyran to find out the truth of the matter, but does not get the answer he wants. While there is a development that will create a festive atmosphere in the Korhans' house, the sacrifice she makes will force Seyran to pay a big price.

episodes.name: Episode 62
episodes.overview: Orhan's release from prison makes everyone very happy, but Suna and Kaya's announcement that they are getting divorced ruins everyone's morale. While Kaya's raising of hands against Suna creates outrage at home, Ferit, who is very angry at the situation, stops him. The news that Kaya raised his hand against Suna makes Seyran and Kazım very angry and they go to Korhan's house, but they see an unexpected reaction from Suna. Ferit, who decides to stop Kazım's bullying, takes Seyran away from Kazım by risking everything. While there is a tender and loving moment between the two, Seyran explains why she had to get engaged. While Seyran's sacrifice affects everyone greatly, they neutralize Ökkeş with the help of Count Ziya. While a surprising development takes place between Halis Ağa and Hattuç, Ferit, who wants to leave the difficult days behind, tries to persuade Seyran to make a new start.

episodes.name: Episode 63
episodes.overview: Even though the ice between Ferit and Seyran melts, Seyran says that there are problems they need to solve. Halis Aga's announcement that he will marry Hattuç creates a bombshell in the house, and the biggest support comes from his grandson Ferit. Thinking that she will completely lose her power in the house if this marriage takes place, İfakat starts to consider blood-curdling plans. Halis Aga and Hattuç, who want to make up for the good days they could not live in the past, want everything to proceed in the marriage process without any deficiencies. Kazım is surprised by his aunt's decision. Ferit, who better understands Seyran's value, supports her in everything and surrounds her. There are unexpected developments between Pelin and Kaya. On the day of the engagement, it falls to Ferit to ask Hattuç from Kazım, but what Hattuç asks for as a bride price shocks everyone.

episodes.name: Episode 64
episodes.overview: Hattuç's arrival is a harbinger that the order in the mansion will change completely. With Halis Aga's endless support, Hattuç begins to make his authority felt while everyone in the house is on edge. As İfakat is shaken by a development she learns from her doctor, she realizes that she must hurry to make an important decision. As the henna preparations continue at home, Ferit, who suspects that a retaliatory attack may come, asks for increased security measures and is justified in his suspicions. Orhan, who wants to increase his power in the company again, does not hesitate to take drastic steps. As the closeness between Pelin and Kaya leads to new conflicts, Seyran sternly warns Pelin. Leaving the bad days of the past behind, Ferit and Seyran make each other feel their love and trust. A terrible surprise awaits Halis and Hattuç, who have been waiting for years for the day they will be reunited on their happiest day.

episodes.name: Episode 65
episodes.overview: As the scene on the bed freezes the blood of the household, Ferit is furious with Abidin, believing that the security did not do their job well enough. Hattuç, on the other hand, tells a story from the past and says that she is the one who is being threatened. Affected by this incident, Hattuç declares martial law in the house so that no one is harmed. The news of Ökkes's death causes Akin to make revenge plans. Ferit and Akin confront each other to prevent bad developments. Trying to make Seyran as happy as he can, Ferit prepares a big and meaningful surprise for her. While the two continue to strive for the good days ahead, Akin takes action for a big plan that will spoil this happiness.

episodes.name: Episode 66
episodes.overview: Ferit, who experienced great anger and panic when Seyran was kidnapped, pursues all possibilities to find out who did this. Learning that Seyran has been kidnapped, Kazim raids the Korhan house because they cannot protect his daughter. All these developments cause a major conflict between Halis Aga and Ferit. What Hattuç tells about the past makes Ferit even more worried about what might happen to Seyran. Seyran, who tries to prevent Ece from getting hurt, realizes that Mezide is preparing to do very bad things. When Ifakat is caught in an inexplicable situation, Gülgün receives the opportunity she has been waiting for for years. While a big operation is launched to save Seyran, Ferit and Seyran are on the thin line between life and death.

episodes.name: Episode 67
episodes.overview: While Ferit and Seyran are on the verge of danger, Akin does something unexpected. Seyran, who comes face to face with death, tries to deal with the deep wounds left by the traumatic pain inflicted on her. While Ifakat, who has been kicked out of the house and is in a difficult situation, is trying to decide what to do, she appears before Halis Aga and tells him a truth that she has been hiding for years. Kaya confesses to Suna a development that will upset her. Old notebooks that have never been mentioned before are opened between Esme and Kazim. Ferit, who does not know how to support Seyran in the face of her pain, feels helpless in the face of this situation. Just when he thought everything was over, a new enemy seeking revenge causes Ferit great anxiety.

episodes.name: Episode 68
episodes.overview: Ferit, who is worried about the threatening message, wants the security measures to be increased even more to prevent anyone from being harmed. While Asuman's inappropriate images with Doruk hit the internet, shaking the family, Halis Ağa reacts greatly to this truth. Ferit, who embarked on a great struggle to find Doruk, is determined to make him pay for what he did. İfakat, who was kicked out of the house, puts a new plan into action to win her place in Halis Ağa's eyes. Seyran, who learns about an unexpected development about her health, takes action to make new and big decisions. Trying to reach the owner of the threatening message, Ferit is not aware that the enemy he is looking for is very close.

episodes.name: Episode 69
episodes.overview: Ferit, who is on guard because of his enemies that he has not yet been able to track down, comes face to face with someone he never expected. Mezide, who is making plans to avenge her son, threatens Gülgün through Ferit and asks her to bring Hattuç. Confused by what he learned from the doctor, Seyran thinks about making new decisions about his life while experiencing the anxiety caused by this development. Noticing that there is something strange about him, Ferit tries to find out the situation. Mezide, who is waiting for good news from Gülgün, is shocked to come face to face with someone she never expected. Learning about Seyran's big problem, Tarık takes action to help her, but this decision brings him face to face with Ferit.

episodes.name: Episode 70
episodes.overview: Ferit, who comes face to face with Tarık, is determined to resolve the issue between him and him. He is angry with Seyran because he thinks she is doing something behind his back. Mezide, who comes face to face with Halis Ağa again after many years, asks for a life in exchange for her son Akın's life. Having difficulty coping with all the trouble she has been through, Seyran experiences an emotional outburst when Ferit does not believe her and says that she has started to get help from a psychiatrist. Halis Agha, who is surprised by Mezide's request, is on the eve of an important decision. İfakat, who feels great remorse for causing her sister's death, faces a development she never expected. Orhan, on the other hand, is advancing step by step into great danger. Even though Seyran tries to hide it, Ferit is on the verge of learning the big truth.

episodes.name: Episode 71
episodes.overview: Seyran works hard to keep Ferit from being aware of her illness. Esme, who is very angry with Kazim, takes her anger out on Zerrin. But she faces a situation she never expected. Esme, who is very worried, asks Tayyar for help. Learning what happened, Seyran and Suna try to support their mother. While Orhan, who never received the appreciation he expected from his father, is very upset about this situation, Ferit makes him feel that he is on his side. Seyran, who is in great uncertainty due to her illness, decides to get help from a psychiatrist. Alarm bells are ringing for Orhan, who is advancing step by step towards a big trap.

episodes.name: Episode 72
episodes.overview: While Orhan's death shakes the Korhan family deeply, Ferit, who experiences great pain with this loss, is greatly disappointed because he cannot see the reaction he expected from his grandfather. Seyran, who holds herself responsible for the deaths of Fuat and Orhan, feels great guilt because she thinks she harmed Ferit and his family. İfakat, who received an unexpected offer from Halis Ağa, is very happy with this development. Seyran, who tries to hide her illness from Ferit, is surprised when someone she never expected finds out this secret. Feeling obliged to be strong in order to avenge his father and protect his loved ones, Ferit makes an important decision and asks for help from Count Ziya. But this new path he will enter will require him to risk giving up all his loved ones when he has to.

episodes.name: Episode 73
episodes.overview: While Pelin's statement that she knows about the disease surprises Seyran, this development leads to cooperation between the two. Deciding to become stronger to protect his loved ones, Ferit receives advice from his biggest supporter, Kont Ziya, on this difficult path. While Ferit is transformed into a completely different person by Kont Ziya, Seyran does not like this change in his behavior and attitudes and finds the solution by informing Halis Aga. However, this move brings Kont Ziya and Halis Aga face to face. Realizing that it is time to put an end to this bad trend, Halis Aga puts into action a bigger plan than anyone could have predicted to punish those who upset the Korhan family. While the real surprise that Halis Aga saved for the end leaves everyone in shock, Seyran is on the fine line between death and life.

episodes.name: Episode 74
episodes.overview: The difficult days push Seyran and Ferit in different directions in life. Feeling happier thanks to Sinan, Seyran surprises everyone by taking a bold step and proposing marriage to him. While Suna tries to explain the gravity of this decision to her sister, Seyran remains certain of her choice. Meanwhile, Ferit has somewhat distanced himself from his past since the arrival of Diyar. However, the news of the developments in Seyran's life is hard for him to handle. Orhan also experiences a significant change in his life, surprising everyone. An unexpected coincidence causes tension between Seyran and Sinan. As Ferit witnesses a scene he can hardly bear, he suddenly finds himself face-to-face with Seyran.

episodes.name: Episode 75
episodes.overview: An unexpected encounter at the wedding causes Ferit and Seyran's feelings to resurface. Seyran attempts to play the role of happiness, which is not easy for Ferit to tolerate. Sinan, who perceives Ferit's emergence as a threat, becomes increasingly aggressive in his relationship with Seyran. A seemingly coincidental encounter further escalates the tension between the two. Suna embarks on a dangerous endeavor to prevent a big secret from being revealed. Ferit, who brings the Korhans to life with his drawings, finds himself on the brink of destruction after the recent events regarding Seyran. While this development puts the Korhans in a difficult situation, a helping hand comes from someone unexpected. Sinan and Seyran are on the verge of a big decision, but someone who was not in the plan makes a move that surprises everyone.

episodes.name: Episode 76
episodes.overview: Ayla, who is not at all positive about her son's marriage to Seyran, begins to make plans to break them up. Ferit makes a great effort to convince Seyran, whose drawings are very popular, to work with him. However, Seyran does not welcome this offer because of her relationship with Sinan. Chasing a big secret, Kazim gets closer to his target step by step. The news that Seyran and Sinan give to their families has a cold shower effect on everyone. Seyran, who wants to build a new and beautiful life with Sinan, finds herself in an unexpected trap. Ferit, on the verge of a vital agreement for the company, thinks that everything is over with the stipulation of a seemingly impossible condition. But a surprise happens at an unexpected moment.

episodes.name: Episode 77
episodes.overview: Seyran, who caught Sinan in a lie, accepts the job and it comes as a big surprise for Ferit. Diyar, who is under pressure from her grandfather to get married, comes to a crossroads in their relationship as she tries to learn Ferit's stance on this issue. Trying to find out what Suna is hiding, Kazim is on the verge of a surprising truth that will change everyone's life. While Seyran and Sinan are preparing to take an important step in their relationship, Ferit is also preparing to turn a new page in his relationship with Diyar. However, the plan made by Ayla, who is trying to separate her son Sinan from Seyran, will bring Seyran and Ferit face to face again at a time they least expect.

episodes.name: Episode 78
episodes.overview: Seyran and Ferit's unexpected encounter not only drags their relationship with Diyar and Sinan into a downward spiral, but also pushes them to make big decisions. While Diyar expects Ferit to make a final choice between Seyran and herself, Sinan wants Seyran to take that step that will make their marriage real. While Seyran tries to keep her emotions under control, Ferit faces a stormy confrontation about his future with Diyar. Ferit must choose between opening a clean slate with Diyar or continuing the past with Seyran. Abidin, confronted with dark secrets from his past, is determined to take his revenge. Now a war awaits the Korhans that they could never have predicted. As their enemies grow in number and power, they have no choice but to unite.

episodes.name: Episode 79
episodes.overview: While Seyran's relationship with Sinan goes downhill because she cannot break away from her past feelings, Ferit is making preparations to establish his future with Diyar. While Orhan finds himself in the middle of an unexpected situation, Abidin is determined to take his revenge on the Korhans. While this situation strains the relations between Suna and Seyran, Esme is shocked by the news she receives. Feeling cornered from all sides by the pressure of marriage in his relationship with Diyar, Ferit comes to a crossroads where he must make a decision between his past and his future. Nothing will ever be the same again.

episodes.name: Episode 80
episodes.overview: Seyran comes back from the brink of a great disaster. This time, Ferit is determined not to leave anything to chance and to guarantee Seyran's safety. As a result of Ferit's decision, Seyran finds herself in a place she never expected but is used to. While it becomes increasingly difficult for both Ferit and Seyran to cope with their emotions, the danger outside is approaching moment by moment. While this danger pushes everyone to unite, a surprise name will knock on the mansion's door and change all the balances.

episodes.name: Episode 81
episodes.overview: Halis tries to understand the events that took place in his absence. Abidin, on the other hand, has decided not to leave without getting what is rightfully his. While Orhan is trying to solve his problems with Betül, Ifakat has already taken the reins. Seyran tries to escape from both her feelings and the memories of the old days in the mansion, but Ferit's behavior makes this almost impossible. While the threat of Sinan continues to loom around, bringing Ferit and Seyran closer together, Diyar is shaken by the final decision from her grandfather. Seyran has to make a choice between what is in her heart and what she knows to be right. With the choice she makes, she finds herself knocking on the door of someone she would never have expected. While Ferit feels trapped more than ever, he realizes what he wants with help from Halis. Tired of rowing against the current, Ferit's challenge to Seyran will lead to surprising results.

episodes.name: Episode 82
episodes.overview: As Seyran and Ferit's life under the same roof begins to disturb everyone, Seyran, who openly challenges Ferit, has a hard time facing the consequences of her decision. Diyar, who does not hesitate to fight for Ferit, finally decides to confront Seyran. While Ifakat is getting ready to enjoy her plan that is working smoothly, an unexpected move from Betül surprises everyone. This time, Abidin is determined to hurt everyone and to remove those who tore him away from where he belongs. As Abidin's anger brings Suna and Seyran face to face, one of the two siblings will have to make a sacrifice. While Ferit is having great difficulty trying to resist Seyran, remembering his turbulent and passionate past with Seyran makes him once again sure of his calm and comfortable relationship with Diyar. Seyran must now overcome even greater obstacles for her feelings for Ferit and fight for her love.
